annotations:
TELiX MSG: CD/09793-00 01/04/24 06:22 +03:00
FROM: HELLASCHART LTD - TEL: +30210 6207587 - FAX: +30210 6209379
GOOD DAY
Plsd to hear your proposals for the very close lady below:
MV EVROPI  53702 / 2005 4 X 30 TNS - JINGTANG 05/10 APRIL AGW
- Last cargos: Iron Ore Fines, Urea, Ferts
MV EVROPI
DOUBLE SKIN BULK CARRIER, FLAG PANAMA, BUILT 2005
DWT: 53702 MTS ON 12,50 M SSW
5HO/HA, LOA: 189.99 M, BEAM: 32.26 M, DEPTH 17.22 M
GT/NT 31144 / 18346, NO SCRUBBER FITTED.
GR/BL 2321874/2247031 CBF, ALL AFT/STEEL FLOORED
HATCH SIZES: NO1 18.86X18.26, NO2-5 21.32X18.26 M
MCGREGOR HCOVERS, CLASS NK, PANDI SKULD, CO2 FITTED
GEAR: 4 X 30 TNS (HOOK LOAD) CRANES, MAX OUTREACH 28 M
GRABS: ELECTROHYDRAULIC GRABS 4X12 CBM
TANK TOP STRENGTH UNIFORM 25 T/M2.
SPEED/CONSUMPTION
LADEN ABT 12.5 KN / BALLAST ABT 13 KN ON ABT 27 MT IFO 380CST PLUS ABT 0.5
MTS LS MGO
PER 24 HRS, VSL IDLE ABT 4 MT IFO PLUS ABT 0.5 MTS LS MGO, WWW ABT 6 MTS IFO
PLUS ABT 0.5 MTS LS MGO
VSL CONSUMES LS MGO FOR GENERATORS AND MAIN ENGINE IN CONFINED/NARROW
WATERS-CHANNELS, CANALS, RIVERS, WHEN SAILING IN BAD WEATHER/ROUGH SEA OR
BELOW 10 KNOTS, ENTERING LEAVING PORTS AND IN GENERAL RESTRICTED TO
NAVIGATION/MANOEUVRING AREA WITH OR WITHOUT PILOTS, TO MASTER’S DISCRETION,
AS WELL AS, FOR STARTING AND STOPPING GENERATORS AND BOILER.
THE SPEED OF THIS VESSEL IS ALWAYS TO BE CONSIDERED AS AVERAGE SPEED FROM SEA
PILOT TO SEA PILOT IN FULLY LADEN CONDITION AND GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS WHICH
ARE DEFINED AS CONTINUOUS PERIODS OF 24 HRS WITH NO ADVERSE CURRENT, NO
NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL, MODERATE SEA, WIND NOT EXCEEDING BF 4 A/O
DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (WITH SIGNIFICANT WAVE HEIGHT UP TO 1.25 MTRS)
BUNKERS SPECIFICATIONS:
LSMGO DMA/DMZ ISO:8217:2010 MAX 0,10% SULPHUR.
VLSFO RMG 380 ISO:8217:2010 MAX 0,5% SULPHUR AND PAS 23263 COMPLIANCE ONCE
PUBLISHED.
COMMINGLE OF VLSFO BUNKERS IS NOT ALLOWED EXCEPT LSMGO WHICH CAN BE COMINGLED.
BIMCO 2020 MARINE FUEL SULPHUR CONTENT CLAUSE FOR TIME CHARTER PARTIES
(ALL FIGURES ABOUT)
Thank you and Best Regards,
Christos  Ntounis
> skype:Christos Ntounis
> mob:+30 6974691112
